channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 14:33 Driven your alarm to the Sumy region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 14:33 Driven your alarm to the Sumy region.Creck on further messages.#Sumy_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
? This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 14:32 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community.
item.description: 游리 14:32 The threat of shelling in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 14:32 Driven the anxiety in the Zhytomyr region. Stop by subsequent messages.
